title: Kanojo Ga Kuzu Wo Aisuru Wake Wa.
alternative_title: 彼女がクズを愛するワケは。; Kanojo ga Kuzu o Aisuru Wake wa.; How Does She Love a Scumbag.
status: 彼女がクズを愛するワケは。; Kanojo ga Kuzu o Aisuru Wake wa.; How Does She Love a Scumbag.
description:
Description :
        Mii-chan loves Hiro-kun, who has no money, no job and he's a cheater!After all, he dated her for more than one week, he remembered the meetup times for the dates, and he remembers her name properly! Hiro-kun is bewildered and can't bring himself to be a complete scumbag to Mii-chan, whose standards for the boyfriend she wants are just way too low! He's scum, but he's kind. He's nice, but he's trash.This is a trashy romance comedy featuring Mii-chan who loves a guy like him so much!+
